item.title: AROMA: Preserving Spatial Structure for Latent PDE Modeling with Local Neural Fields
item.description: AROMA: Attentive Reduced Order Model with Attention enhances PDE modeling with local neural fields, offering efficient processing of diverse geometries and superior performance in simulating 1D and 2D…
